TopicTitle: Refueled tanks show empty on engine

Articles.Content:
On two different ships that I've refueled from my Minmus station and then left in a parking orbit for an extended period of time this happened. When I went to execute their next maneuver their fuel tanks show as full but they have an engine that registers as empty and will not fire. I've listed my mods bellow & included screen shots of 2 ships that had this happen. 

Alcubierre Stand alone, version: 0.2.1

Blizzy's Toolbar, version: 1.7.9
